dcterms:description: PyDial is an open-source statistical spoken dialogue system toolkit that provides domain-independent implementations of all the dialogue system modules, allowing for the creation of benchmarking environments for dialogue management.
dcterms:title: PyDial

dcterms:creator: Jason Williams
Iker Arizmendi
Alistair Conkie
dcterms:description: The Dialogue State Tracking Challenges (DSTC) is a benchmarking framework for evaluating dialogue state tracking algorithms, providing a set of tasks for testing dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: Dialogue State Tracking Challenges (DSTC)

dcterms:creator: Jiwei Li
Alexander H Miller
Sumit Chopra

dcterms:description: BABIdialogue tasks are a set of tasks designed for evaluating dialogue systems, focusing on end-to-end goal-oriented dialogue.
dcterms:title: BABIdialogue tasks
